pages.title: Flux Networks
pages.text: Allows you to transfer power over long distances or even across dimensions.$(br2)Craft the flux controller first to be able to create a network for your power input and outputs. Then you can create Flux Plugs and Flux Points to store and take energy from your network.
Look up @fluxnetworks in JEI to see the different items you can craft.
The Flux Plug takes energy from external sources and sends that power into whatever network you select in it's GUI.
The Flux Point puts energy into what it's connected to and takes out energy from whatever network you select in it's GUI.
